SELECT I.NO AS ING_NO, I.NAME AS ING_NAME, I.EXPLANATION, I.SRC AS ING_SRC, IC.CATEGORY AS ING_CATEGORY_NAME FROM INGREDIENT I JOIN ING_CATEGORY IC ON I.CATEGORY_NO = IC.NO
AND I.NAME LIKE ''
AND I.NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%'
ORDER BY I.NO

SELECT R.AMOUNT ,NVL(I.ALC,0) AS ALC ,I.NAME AS ING_NAME ,NVL(B.BASE_NAME,'없음') AS BASE_NAME ,A.NAME AS AMOUNT_NAME FROM RECIPE R JOIN AMOUNT A ON R.AMOUNT_NO = A.NO JOIN INGREDIENT I ON R.ING_NO = I.NO LEFT JOIN BASE B ON I.BASE_NO = B.NO WHERE R.COCKTAIL_NO = #{cocktailNo}
